body: These can be a photograph, scan or photocopy of the original document.

components.hint: For example, a copy of your driving licence or passport. Maximum size: 7MB per file
components.label: Photo ID
components.name: auto_name__82

components.hint: For example an electricity or council tax bill in your name and it must be dated within the last 6 months. Maximum file size: 7MB
components.label: Proof of address
components.name: auto_name__83

components.html: If you are on probation and don't have any ID, you can upload a scan or photograph of a signed letter from your probation officer on Probation Service headed paper. This can be used for both Photo ID and Proof of Address.
components.summary: If you don't have any ID

heading: Upload your ID
lede: You must upload both proof of ID and address.
